thread.title: Photos: Huge fires tear through Christchurch's Port Hills
thread.title_full: Photos: Huge fires tear through Christchurch's Port Hills

title: Photos: Huge fires tear through Christchurch's Port Hills
text:
Smoke rising from the Port Hills fires, seen from Lyttelton. HELEN STANTON 
A line of flames burns across the Port Hills. HELEN STANTON 
One of the Port Hills fires as seen from Watlings Pl, Kennedys Bush, on Monday evening. HELEN STANTON 
Flames near a house on the Port Hills. ETHAN TAKEREI 
Billowing smoke dwarfs houses as flames engulf the Port Hills. IAIN MCGREGOR/FAIRFAX NZ 
Firefighters battled the wildfire into the night. IAIN MCGREGOR/FAIRFAX NZ 
The blaze rips through trees on Christchurch's Port Hills. CHRIS HELLYAR 
Smoke and flames from the Port Hills fire could be seen from 28km away at Lake Ellesmere. KAT ANDERSON 
Smoke from the Port Hills blaze forms a dark backdrop to Christchurch's Colombo St. ARTHUR APANOVICS 
The Christchurch Port Hills fire, seen from Quarry Park. GEORGE HEARD/FAIRFAX NZ 
The blaze lights up the night sky as firefighters tackle the flames. JOHN KIRK-ANDERSON/FAIRFAX NZ 
The Port Hills fire viewed from Osterholts Road, Tai Tapu. GEORGE HEARD/FAIRFAX NZ 
Helicopters attack the blaze with monsoon buckets. GEORGE HEARD/FAIRFAX NZ 
Palls of smoke rise from the blaze as the evening sets in. - Stuff
